## DynVar.bind() method

Starts new dynamic scope in which given `val` will be bound to this variable. In most cases, calls to `bind()` should always be eventually followed by calls to [DynVar.unbind()](./dynvar.dynvar.unbind.md) to restore this var's previously scoped value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bind(val: T): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  val | <code>T</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
